item.title: India to Singapore (Vande Bharat Mission) FAQs
item.description:
Hi Travellers,

Though this is a technical blog, I thought of helping people, who are travelling from India to Singapore under VBM (Vande Bharat Mission). My wife is one of the traveller.

Congratulations on getting approval from MOM after multiple rejections and a flight ticket of course.

Here is the list of frequently asked questions. Please comment if you find something to be corrected, or added in this post.
